overview: Video Diaries is an ongoing project by Amirali Ghasemi since 2001, the first edition of this work was shown in Iranian Artist forum in 2002 which was a single Channel 17 min loop of 47 short documentary clips which were shot by Amirali in various public places frequenting from streets, cafés, galleries and artists’ studios as well as private places. The current edition is a 6 min version of the work re-edited by four split screens and tends to give a snapshot-like overview of his life in the early 20s at the beginning of he professional career.
title: Video Diaries
